title: The Flame Must Burn
description: Good girls like me don't fall in love with foreigners.The hottest summer brings the first flames of love.Love is dangerous. It collides with culture, and culture is defied with rebellion.Good girls like me have been taught to honor tradition.We don't fraternize with men.Now, I'm a foreign-exchange student at a study abroad summer program. I'm at the beach when his dark eyes pierced into mine.Love, at first sight, doesn't exist... until it did for us.Our eyes lock together and the desire in his eyes makes me afraid.To have a desire is like having a disease. It leads to deadly consequences.I quickly scatter away, but I see him the next day in my summer class.The local small-town biker, Ryder keeps writing love letters to me.He calls me Blue Eyes, and I fear our dangerous future.We have nothing in common, but then an incident happens that draws us, two star-crossed lovers, together... but summer doesn't last forever though, and I have to return home.A single decision could destroy my perfectly, controlled world.Our love story is forbidden.
author: Beena Khan
